column4: can anyone offer any suggestions for this ï»¿strange problem with my server... for some reason networking has gone down, i can't ping any hosts beyond my LAN, was working fine up until yesterday, i can ping the server LAN IP and other IP's on the LAN, but no IP's on the internet
can you check what is the gateway ip on your machine ?
gateway is router, and IP is 192.168.1.100 is correct on server interfaces file
